---
title: "The OSC reached 100 individual members!"
date: 2024-05-10
---


<p>With <a href="../../members/individual_members/lmu-members/topinkova/index.html" title="Topinkova">Dr. Renata Topinkova</a>, the OSC now counts 100 individual members. To celebrate this milestone, our 100th member will be offered a free reproducibility check for her next manuscript.</p>
<p>Please consult <a href="https://www.osc.uni-muenchen.de/members/individual_members/index.html">the list of all our members</a> to find potential collaborators!</p>
<p>If you're also interested in becoming an OSC member, you can read more detailed information <a href="https://www.osc.uni-muenchen.de/join/index.html">here</a> and write an email to <a href="mailto:%20malika.ihle@lmu.de.">malika.ihle@lmu.de</a>.</p>
